Message.Title: Does Paypal processing bypass the Mastercard or Visa's network?
Message.Msg: If I use a Mastercard online with Paypal to pay, does Paypal's processing bypass mastercard's network? Or the Mastercard will still receive a fee because it is its card?

Message.Msg: I checked Ebay's website and it still shows 30 days for the certificate? I hope this is not a New Year glitch!

Topic.Title: Does Paypal processing bypass the Mastercard or Visa's network?

Message.Msg: Paypal collects its fee for handling the online transaction because of the privacy/security they offer for the transaction. Mastercard collects it fee because of the straight forward processing service they offer between you and the bank/lender. Paypal between you and the seller, Mastercard between you and the bank/lender.

No don't be talking 'bout our loofahs Willis! It's all we have to stuff our own stockings. As a certified beancounter, I applaud someone who got us all to believe he had 1000s of IDs (when only we did) and used reverse psychology and our ongoing public mental illnesses to ride this puppy profitably from the teens as a long, while shorting easily predictable dips as a short. Genius! Well played. Well played. I am not happy they used HIS idea to change this board! But that is the power of leadership.
